text:
May 16, 1956
Miss Anna Hyer
Associate Executive Secretary
Department of Audio-Visual Instruction
National Education Association
1210 Sixteenth Street, N. W,
Washington 6, D. C.
Dear Anna:
Bob Underwood, our Network Manager, will shortly send you lists of our
Network offerings* These will have to be negotiated for with contributing
stations as in the past, except for grant-in-aid series for which the STRC
and we hold all title and rights. If any of these are desired, we111 do
our best to clear them* They will all be included in the lists sent you.
A question regarding exchange of publications, asked by Floyde in a letter
today: When I attended your Convention did 1 pay dues to DAVI (included
in the registration)? Since we don*t handle that way, I thought I'd betÂ¬
ter check. If not, we can trade Newsletter for Instructional Materials*
Will you pass that reaction on to floyde, please?
Sincerely,
HJSjcr
Hariy J. Skornia
Executive Director
